Perfect garden decorations: Solar powered outdoor lights can be used for outdoor decoration for the patio, yard, lawn, and walkway. item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:05 UTC – Details)



【Super Large Projection Area】The upgrade Christmas light projector is designed with two heads, which can cover a larger area than others, its optimal projected area of 215-323ft² with the best projection distance is 16ft-33ft, so it can well cover your house, bedroom, or garden; The clarity of patterns depends on the brightness of the environment
【Waterproof Design & Weather Resistance】The snowflake projector light outdoor features waterproof performance, the light is IP65 waterproof rating and the power adapter is IP44 waterproof rating, which suits for outdoors no matter what weather it is raining or snowing; it can operate normally between -25°C- 32°C, so don’t worry about the hot summer and cold winter; please don’t let it directly soak in a rainstorm
【Easy to set up & Adjustable】 It just takes you a minute or two to install it; our Christmas snowflake projector light comes with a round base and a ground stake, you can put the base on a desk indoors, or you can plug the stake into the ground in your garden, yard, you also can install it on the wall with screws; Equipped with a 360°shaft rotary joint, it is ever so convenient and flexible to adjust the projection place where you want, without dismantling, you can turn it anywhere you want
【Xmas Gift Idea & Xmas Decoration】The Christmas projector outdoor can be given as a special gift to your family, or friends; also it is a great choice to add to the Christmas decoration, suits for Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Valentine’s Day, family gathering, party, theme activity, garden landscape house, bedroom decorations

Product Description

SOLAR POWERED: This garden solar outdoor light used with a solar panel, powered by a solar battery charging system that supports 7 hours operations after fully charged. Auto Turn on/off.
EASY TO INSTALL: With garden stake stand, press the stake into the soil and keep the switch is in “AUTO” position. Just press it to somewhere you want. No wiring or external electricity required.
MOON SHAPE DECOR: Made of stainless steel and crackle glass, the garden light is great for decorating your pathway, garden, lawn, patio or courtyard, with waterproof warm white LED.
SIZE: 7.5” x 3” x 30.5”. Durable construction and weather resistant feature of the garden solar lights ensures long lasting performance under most weather conditions.
QUALITY GUARANTEED: This powered solar light is certified by FCC, CE, ROSH, keeps reliable and endurable with high-quality design.

Product Description

KITVONA Outdoor Sunflower Light Solar Garden Decor for Garden, Back Yard, Grave Decoration, Lawn Yard Ornaments

Sunflower Solar Decorative Light (2 Pack)Order yours today!

Do you want to make your garden more attractive?

Kitvona solar garden light quickly install by pushing this lights into the ground wherever you want a beautiful illuminated decoration, perfect as path lights and in-ground lights Suitable for the Garden, Trees, Flowers, Flowerbed, Fence, Walkway, Bird bath, farmhouse porch decor, lawn fountain, this garden solar lights Does it all.

Design with warm LED, illuminates paths and porches while showing off the beautiful sunflower.

Simply press the switch to on position, easy installation, No wiring required. Safe for indoor or outdoor decoration use.

Glow in Dark

Kitvona decorative solar garden lights charge during day (ensure the switch is in ‘ON’ position) and turn on automatically at night for up to 8 hours when full charged.

Gorgeous & Realistic

Kitvona solar sunflower light is idea for decorating your backyard, special for spring, summer, fall, winter decorations. also a gift idea for Mom, women friend, grandma.

Maximize Available Sunlight

Polysilicon solar panels used, still work in a rainy day-waterproof. Kitvona patio decor light built in a 600MAH rechargeable battery to keep working a long time.

Easy to install

Installation without tools, convenient and quick. Just insert the sunflower yard decor stakes into soil or ground wherever you want a nice illuminated garden decoration.
